duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate communication between the Design Team and licensing partners worldwide.
Submit accurate data to the licensor and gain approval for concepts.
Provide production-ready imagery to the licensor and authorize the shipping of products.
Communicate any requirements to the factory based on licensor feedback.
Inform all relevant parties of the submission status once the licensor approves the product for shipping.
Streamline internal processes, minimize errors, and ensure full model-related approval for products and packaging to improve speed to market.
Establish a communication network with all functional departments, maintain relationships, and manage daily relations/communications with brand and agency clients.
Attend creative calls with the Design Team to present innovative concepts and understand feedback from the Licensor.
Monitor, document, and maintain the progress of all models as it relates to the approval process.
Responsible for collecting and submitting artwork to the Licensor and subsequently, any changes/resubmits requested.
Obtain all necessary approvals for Licensors for all product concepts and pre-production samples and resolve all issues efficiently.
Coordinate DTR licensed approvals with major retailers (Walmart, Target, etc.).
Request artwork be released to the factories once the design is approved.
Submit pre-production and/or production samples to Licensor, and initiate communication with the appropriate parties once approved to ship.
Communicate to the factory any comments or revisions from the Licensor.
Maintain a record of all submission approvals.
Provide training and guidelines as needed to internal team members.
Follow through/update weekly to ensure all deliverables meet their deadline(s).

education_certification.credential: Associate degree in business, communications, or a related field required. May substitute for four years of work experience. Strong time management experience. Superior interpersonal, written communication, and data entry skills. Excellent decision-making and organizational skills. Knowledge of product development or working in a creative division within product development is strongly preferred.
